q1.content: What is the highest degree or grade you’ve completed?
q1.requirement: Identify the highest level of education completed by the interviewee.

q2.requirement: Determine the current enrollment status of the interviewee in an educational institution.

q3.content: Have you been enrolled in school during the past 3 months?
q3.requirement: Ascertain if the interviewee was enrolled in school at any point in the last 3 months.
